greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number T(n,k) of compositions of n, where k is the difference between the number of odd parts and the number of even parts, both counted without multiplicity; triangle T(n,k), n>=0, read by rows.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..500, flattened
maple: b:= proc(n, i, p) option remember; `if`(n=0, p!, `if`(i<1, 0,
mathematica: b[n_, i_, p_] := b[n, i, p] = If[n==0, p!, If[i<1, 0, Expand[Sum[If[j==0, 1, x^(2*Mod[i, 2]-1)]*b[n-i*j, i-1, p+j]/j!, {j, 0, n/i}]]]]; T[n_] := Function[p, Table[Coefficient[p, x, i], {i, Exponent[p, x, Min], Exponent[p, x]}]][b[n, n, 0]]; Table[T[n], {n, 0, 20}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Jan 17 2017, translated from Maple *)
xref: Cf. A242498 (compositions with multiplicity), A242618 (partitions without multiplicity).
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, May 19 2014
